name.en: Special Topics on radar observation of cloud microphysics
name.ch: 雲物理之雷達觀測特論

goal.en: “As the development of the society progressing and the economic activity increasing, the disaster associated with various mesoscale weather events increases as well. The mesoscale weather systems can vary dramatically from several kilometers to thousands of kilometers in spatial and minutes to days in temporal. As the progresses of the meteorological radar observing technique, including dual-polarimetric radar and disdrometer and the improvements of the numerical weather prediction model, the understanding of the mesoscale weather system increases vastly. The content of this course includes, introduction of dual-polarimetric radar, data quality control and processing, characteristics of dual-polarimetric measurements of various microphysical processes, cloud microphysical property retrieval, DSD property retrieval and QPE, etc.“
goal.ch: “近年來隨著社會進步、經濟活動繁榮，致災性劇烈中尺度天氣事件所造成的損失逐漸增加。有別於綜觀天氣系統及近地面氣象，中尺度系統多變且複雜，空間尺度可從數公里到千公里之廣，時間尺度從數十分鐘到數天之久。隨著氣象雷達觀測技術的發展，包含雙偏極化雷達及雨滴譜儀對於中尺度天氣系統的監控，以及中尺度數值模式的進步，而更了解中尺度降水系統的變化。本課程目的為介紹雙偏極化雷達及雲物理觀測, 並教授雙偏極化雷達觀測原理、雙偏極化雷達資料品質與處理、雙偏極化雷達資料特性在不同雲物理特性下的變化，雲物理特性反演，雨滴粒徑分佈特性與反演、定量降水估計(QPE)等相關議題。“
